hedline.hl1: A Movie Wardrobe for Streetwise Pops

abstract.p: Armani line of clothing inspired by movie Shaft noted; photo (Father's Day Pulse column) (S)

block.p: Golf sweaters? Rep ties? As John Shaft, the detective hero in John Singleton's coming remake of ''Shaft'' might say, shut your mouth! For fathers with serious style, Giorgio Armani has designed a line of clothing based on the ''Shaft'' wardrobe created for the movie's star, Samuel L. Jackson. Urban and streetwise, the line includes the signature three-quarter-length Shaft leather jacket ($1,298), with raw-cut edges and unfinished seams. There are also turtlenecks and sexy knits ($228 for each), and even black leather pants ($698). While the look may be a bit of a departure from the traditional Father's Day fare, every man deserves a little sartorial adventure. After all, Dad's the original cat who won't cop out when there's danger all about. At Emporio Armani, (877) 736-7674.
